meanings.definition: To produce a printing plate by photographic methods.
meanings.sent1: The artist will photoengrave the design onto the plate.
meanings.sent2: They decided to photoengrave the logo for the brochure.
meanings.sent3: I tried to photoengrave my face on a cookie, but it didn't turn out well.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a photoengraved image, clear and permanent.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight seemed to photoengrave the scene into her mind.

meanings.sent1: The photoengrave displayed intricate details of the landscape.
meanings.sent2: She admired the photoengrave of the famous painting.
meanings.sent3: The photoengrave on the wall looked like a tiny window to another world.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like a photoengrave, capturing every moment with precision.
meanings.sent5: The photoengrave seemed to come to life under the bright lights.
